name: Savanna Story Diamond Edition
description:
For MAC and Linux users, I highly recommend running the game through local files! And you are guaranteed to run the game! Because through the Library the game may not run due to the lack of support for 32 bit games of some devices of these operating systems!
Savanna Story Diamond Edition - It is a non-linear visual novel with elements of drama. The action of the game takes place in 2012! Savannah is on the brink of war! The fate of Savannah is in your hands! This is a remake of the game Lionessy Story (Maltakreuz,Goodsir,Maxim Garagulin). This edition features absolute 4k and HDR graphics, you will be instantly immersed in Savannah! Benefits of Savanna Story Diamond Edition:
1) Beautiful music!
2) HDR and 4K graphics!
3) Highly interactive!
4) One of the few Savannah-themed visual novels!
5) Play as multiple characters!
6) Boss battles!
7) Good dramatization!
8) In-depth plot!
Also visit my website!
I hope for your support! I will do more global projects in the future! But without your help I won't be able to give you these projects! Take care of your family and friends with love Irbis!
I will also add! The game does not want to offend anyone, all the facts that seemed offensive to you are just fiction that in no way refers to real life! That's all for sure now! We wish you a pleasant purchase!
